name: BGProcessingTaskRequest
desc: A request to launch your app in the background to execute a processing task that can take minutes to complete.

items.name: init(identifier: String)
items.desc: Return a new processing task request for the specified identifier.

items.name: var requiresExternalPower: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean specifying if the processing task requires a device connected to power.

items.name: var requiresNetworkConnectivity: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean specifying if the processing task requires network connectivity.
